title.rendered: How to download music from YouTube and free songs without programs |  Technology

content.rendered:
Downloading music from YouTube is very simple. On the internet you have at your disposal countless pages that allow you to download songs and music from YouTube without programs. As there are many, we have selected the best alternatives for you. Take note!

Since it hosts millions of videos, many users use YouTube to discover and listen to music. If you are one of them and would like to save a copy of the songs from these videos on your computer, you have different pages at your disposal specialized websites that allow you to download audio files of these contents.

Thanks to that you will be able to enjoy your favorite music anywhere and not depend on whether you have an Internet connection or not, since the resulting file will be in your device’s storage.

Below we have compiled some of the best pages to download music from YouTube without programsthe pure and hard audio and without images.

Websites that we have at our disposal to download music from YouTube:

How to download a YouTube video on your PC (2022)

clipconverter.cc

Clipconverter.cc is one of the most popular websites for download youtube songs. Although it can also be used to download videos, the platform has an option that allows download music from YouTube.com in MP3 formatwithout the need to perform any conversion afterwards.

Of course, it does not require installing any program, and the whole process is done from the browser.

These are the best sports headphones of 2021

You can use the service both from your computer and from your mobile, so if you wish you have the possibility of saving the file directly on your smartphone to play it locally.

Regardless of the device you use, the procedure to follow to download a song using this web page is as follows:

  • Go to ClipConverter.cc page.
  • Then, in the box that has the title Multimedia Directionpaste the URL of the YouTube video that we want to download in MP3 format.
  • Next, click on the button Continue.
  • Once the verification is finished, in the Conversion Format: click on the option MP3. Then, ignore the rest of the settings and click on the button Continue.
  • At the moment in which the video has finished converting, you only have to click on the button Download to download the audio file of the video that you entered in the first step.
  • What we can do is choose the quality of the resulting audio.

online video converter

Aesthetically it is not the page for download an mp3 from youtube The most beautiful, nor the one with the least publicity, but on the other hand, it is one of the most complete, since in addition to being able to download songs from YouTube without programs, it allows you to do the same with Facebook, Vimeo, Dailymotion and many other services.

It is also one of the few pages to download the audio of a YouTube video that allows you to select the quality of the resulting audio, and convert a specific section of it by selecting the exact minute of the beginning of the conversion and the end.

These are the steps you have to take to convert a song or the audio of a YouTube video into MP3 with this website:

  • First, we enter the Onlinevideoconverter website
  • Click on Convert a video link
  • We paste the link of the YouTube video that we want to download in the box at the top, where it says Enter a URL, for example…
  • Display the list just below and select the audio format you want. Normally MP3.
  • If you want to choose the audio quality, or the song section of the YouTube video you want to download, click on More settings and configure the options.
  • The last step is to press on Beginin a few moments you will have the audio from a YouTube video on your hard drive.

FLVTO

The way to work with this website is extremely simple and very similar to what we have seen in previous cases.

We can transform any YouTube video into MP3, MP4, MP4 HD, AVU or AVI HD. We have a good number of options, although what really interests us is convert to mp3.

  • We entered FLVTO.
  • we just have to copy the url of the YouTube video in the part of the website dedicated to it.
  • Now it’s time to press on Convert so that when the option comes out Download let’s click on it and so the file is saved in our internal storage.

Save To MP3

Another good website where we can download the music from any video from YouTube is Save To MP3. It is a secure website with an interface that is quite improvable, but very effective.

The lack of an attractive interface makes up for it by being one of the faster websites as far as the transformation process from one format to another is concerned. We must do the following to work with it:

  • We open Save To MP3.
  • Now we click on Search for a video.
  • Automatically it is shown to us in the top of screen the area where we must write the name of the YouTube video.
  • Then we press the Enter of our keyboard.
  • At that moment we will see below the advertising, the thumbnail of the video and two download options Download MP4 Y Download MP3, which we must press.
  • The MP3 file will automatically save where we have preconfigured downloads to be saved.

freemake

Although it may be that some of you know the Freemaker applications such as Video Converter and Video Downloader, the truth is that the web is one of the best and fastest to download the audio of a YouTube video.

The trick on this website is not to succumb to the number of times they offer you to install their application, because if you manage to do this, you will be able to have the sound of any video extremely quickly.

  • We open the Freemake download website.
  • Later we will see how we have a place where we can write the url of the YouTube video, action that we are going to carry out.
  • Once we see that it has been loaded at the bottom, we choose the format in which we want to download it, in our case being MP3.
  • Then we click on download now.
  • It will take us to a black web where we can listen to the audio of the video. There we only have to select in the three vertical dots that we see next to the timeline and click on Download.
  • At that time it will start downloading in the default folder for it.

If you like to keep up to date with the latest product offers and recommendations, you can follow them in real time on the Computerhoy.com channel on Telegram, where we will keep you informed of the latest technology discounts.

YouTube Premium

By contracting the paid version of YouTube you have access to multiple advantages, such as the music service YouTube Music Premium that allows you to listen offline everything you want and without ads.

the price of the subscription is 9.99 euros per month for single planbut you can always try the service for free for 30 days to see if you are convinced by an option that more and more users are using.

If you want to choose the family subscription is cost will be 14.99 euros per month, but up to 5 members of the family unit may participate. The free month is maintained in this option.

The 9 best strategy games for Android of 2022 and that you have to download right now

Finally, if we want to listen to YouTube music offline on any compatible device, we can hire the version for Students for 4.99 euros, obviously, if you are still studying. The free month is also granted.

These are some of the best websites that we currently have to download the music of our favorite YouTube videosso we can only encourage you to try them and tell us, through our social networks, which one you liked the most.
